basic.description: An introduction to the principles of geomorphology relevant go Geological Sciences and Geological Engineering. An emphasis is made on the evaluation of terrain features using analog and digital imagery using traditional and digital (GIS) methods. Terrain analysis using computational  methods, generation of surface models from LiDAR and imagery, and integration into simulations.
basic.subject: GEOE
basic.title: Terrain Evaluation

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: APSC 151 or permission of the department. Must also be registered in BSCE.
